segments.en: 11. The Exterior as Suffering in the Three Times
“Mendicants, sights of the past and future are suffering,

segments.pli: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu rūpesu anapekkho hoti;
anāgate rūpe nābhinandati; paccuppannānaṃ rūpānaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti … pe ….

sections.title: “Mendicants, sights of the past and future are suffering,…

suttaplex.blurb: In the past, future, and present, the six exterior sense fields are suffering and not-self. When a noble disciple truly sees them like this, they become disillusioned and liberated.
